item.description:
Get your monthly fix of fabulous footwear Thursday, March 10th from 6:30-8:30pm at The Landsdowne Pub as we gather for another Hello Stiletto Shoe Party.

Put on your hottest heels and come show them off. We'll have prizes for "Best in Shoe," complimentary appetizers, and a signature drink special in honor of the evening.

Plus, meet Deborah Carducci, President of Villa Lusso who will be showcasing the company's beautiful collection of Italian inspired home and beauty products.

For more details on the Hello Stiletto Shoe Club and to join for free, visit www.shoeclub.us
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) in our area (or look for ladies with great shoes on!) If you have trouble finding us, please call 774 232 0000.
item.why: Join us for a Hello Stiletto Shoe Club ladies night party- put on your sexy shoes and come out for a fun, informal get together with other shoe lovers! Enjoy complimentary appetizers too!
item.name: Ladies Night with the Hello Stiletto Shoe Club- Free Apps!
